mapper.select: SELECT vm_cloud_server.`id`, vm_cloud_server.`instance_uuid`, vm_cloud_server.`source_id`, vm_cloud_server.`project_id`, vm_cloud_server.`account_id`, vm_cloud_server.`instance_id`, vm_cloud_server.`instance_name`, vm_cloud_server.`image_id`, vm_cloud_server.`auto_renew`, CASE WHEN recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' and vm_cloud_server.instance_status !='Deleted' THEN 'ToBeRecycled' ELSE vm_cloud_server.instance_status END AS instance_status, vm_cloud_server.`instance_type`, vm_cloud_server.`instance_type_description`, vm_cloud_server.`region`, vm_cloud_server.`zone`, vm_cloud_server.`host_id`, vm_cloud_server.`host`, vm_cloud_server.`resource_pool_id`, vm_cloud_server.`resource_pool`, vm_cloud_server.`remote_ip`, vm_cloud_server.`ip_array`, vm_cloud_server.`os`, vm_cloud_server.`os_version`, vm_cloud_server.`cpu`, vm_cloud_server.`memory`, vm_cloud_server.`disk`, vm_cloud_server.`hostname`, vm_cloud_server.`management_ip`, vm_cloud_server.`management_port`, vm_cloud_server.`os_info`, vm_cloud_server.`remark`, vm_cloud_server.`network`, vm_cloud_server.`vpc_id`, vm_cloud_server.`subnet_id`, vm_cloud_server.`network_interface_id`, vm_cloud_server.`management_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`remote_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`local_ipv6`, vm_cloud_server.`ip_type`, vm_cloud_server.`snap_shot`, vm_cloud_server.`create_time`, vm_cloud_server.`update_time`, vm_cloud_server.`expired_time`, vm_cloud_server.`last_operate_time`, IF(vm_cloud_server.instance_status='Deleted',vm_cloud_server.`last_operate_time`,NULL) as delete_time, vm_cloud_server.`vm_tools_version`, vm_cloud_server.`vm_tools_status`, vm_cloud_server.`instance_charge_type`, vm_cloud_server.`security_group_ids`, vm_cloud_server.apply_user, user._name as applyUserName, cloud_account.NAME AS account_name, cloud_account.platform AS platform, IF(orgWorkspace.type = "workspace",orgWorkspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(orgWorkspace.type = "workspace",orgWorkspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name, orgWorkspace.organization_id, orgWorkspace.organization_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace orgWorkspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = orgWorkspace.id LEFT JOIN user ON vm_cloud_server.apply_user = user.username LEFT JOIN recycle_bin ON vm_cloud_server.id = recycle_bin.resource_id AND recycle_bin.resource_type = 'VM' AND recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled' ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, cloud_account.NAME AS account_name, cloud_account.platform AS platform, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name, org_workspace.organization_id, org_workspace.organization_name, user._name as apply_user FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN cloud_account ON vm_cloud_server.account_id = cloud_account.id LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN user ON vm_cloud_server.apply_user = user.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT vm_cloud_server.*, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.id,NULL) as workspace_id, IF(org_workspace.type = "workspace",org_workspace.NAME,NULL) as workspace_name FROM vm_cloud_server LEFT JOIN org_workspace ON vm_cloud_server.source_id = org_workspace.id LEFT JOIN recycle_bin ON vm_cloud_server.id = recycle_bin.resource_id AND recycle_bin.resource_type = 'VM' AND recycle_bin.STATUS = 'ToBeRecycled'
(recycle_bin.STATUS is null or recycle_bin.STATUS !='ToBeRecycled')
